cause.description:
The multicultural diaspora's generations of students, professionals, and academia come together through this program to produce positive works of mentorship, academic aid, and charity in order to promote cultural awareness, cross cultural acceptance, as well as professional advancement for members of the multicultural diaspora. Through the practice of positive leadership and cross-cultural cooperation, Komak wishes to promote peace, prosperity, goodwill, education, and progress. Through Komak's efforts, a strong network of people unite to better themselves and the world around them.
1. Many cultural societies should come together to promote goodwill and progress through charitable work
2. Promotion of education both domestically and internationally promotes peace and prosperity
3. Giving people a chance to practice leadership fosters the increase of better leaders in the future internationally
cause.mission: Provide mentorship and perform successful multicultural charity projects
cause.name: Komak
